about_the_game:
Pixel Puzzles Musical is a new and unique way to experience your favourite music and your favourite puzzle game simultaneously.

This release brings the exciting, energetic music of The Nearly Deads to Pixel Puzzles.

The four-piece, featuring vocalist Theresa Jeane, guitarist/bassist Steven Tobi, guitarist Javier Garza Jr. and drummer Josh Perrone, rocketed to stardom with the playful-yet-powerful "Never Look Back,” and its 10-million strong zombie-laced music video. The kinetic energy of the song provided an apt soundtrack to the exhilarating catharsis of out-running the walking dead, both literally and figuratively.

Running is in their blood. Over the past decade, The Nearly Deads have traversed the U.S., sharing stages with the likes of In This Moment, Halestorm, Icon For Hire and The All-American Rejects, among many others at notable festivals including Rock-Fest, Summerfest, Warped Tour and Pridefest.

PACK INFO:

Music Tracks: 5
Puzzle Count: 11
Total Piece Count: 1782

TRACKS:

  • Track 1 - As Good as It Gets
  • Track 2 - Freak Show
  • Track 3 - I Said
  • Track 4 - My Evil Ways
  • Track 5 - Watch Your Back

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Puzzle 1 - 216
  • Puzzle 2 - 140
  • Puzzle 3 - 96
  • Puzzle 4 - 216
  • Puzzle 5 - 330
  • Puzzle 6 - 216
  • Puzzle 7 - 96
  • Puzzle 8 - 96
  • Puzzle 9 - 140
  • Puzzle 10 - 140
  • Puzzle 11 - 96
